body_html: I see this regression also. Training is 5 times slower with 1.6 vs. 1.5 on my slightly modified copy of the CIFAR10 example from https://github.com/tensorflow/models. CPU usage is 20X higher for that 5X slower training run. This translates to a 100X increase in CPU usage per batch. Something is very wrong.
